title: Obsessions 13
overview: All Nikita Bellucci's obsessions are gathered in this episode: swinging when she and her husband Rico share a torrid moment with Lauren Walker and her companion, but also candaulism when she fucks with a stranger in front of her man; sensuality when Nikita becomes Lorenzo's very naughty masseuse and, finally, sapphism and complicity with Clara Mia, when the latter flirts with the star in a tattoo parlour.
